name: monaurally

monaurally adverb
(EAR)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to or uses only one ear: The performance of the monaurally impaired participants in the experiments is reported below. The sounds were played to the participants monaurally, to either the left or the right ear.
More examplesFewer examplesThe new hearing aid was fitted monaurally in the left ear. The monaurally deprived animals did not behave normally in the experiment.

monaurally adverb
